title: How to show contacts from only one account?
content:
My Phone have 2 gmail accounts, 1 hotmail account,  1 skype 1 cisco jaber and one Nine installed.
when I open my contact app and search for people, a lots of dupilcated records will shown.  but there is no duplicated records in my main Gmail account. I believe it's caused by showing all the gmail hotmail accounts all together. I don't need that. how can I change this? only show my Main gmail contacts in my dialer and contact app? not others?

how could i know which one belongs to which account?

https://photos.app.goo.gl/dvpLe4eboK9sjB6p7
